Hero.long-text: Do you want a peaceful and relaxing vacation away from the crowds, yet close to events, entertainment, delicious food, and fine wines that Istria offers? Here you can find the perfect blend of relaxation and enjoyment in everything Istria provides!

Second.opis-1: Charming towns, wine routes, cycling trails, and beautiful beaches â€“ everything is at your fingertips.
Second.opis-2: Enjoy the tranquility of nature and a relaxing environment. Istria is the perfect place to escape everyday stress.
Second.opis-3: Enjoy comfort and relaxation, with top features that meet all your needs.

Third.opis-1: Please familiarize yourself with the rules to ensure a pleasant stay for all guests. Thank you for your understanding!
Third.opis-2: Explore photos showcasing the beauty of our space and the wonderful moments you can experience during your stay.
